name: mad shooter
description:
Hello everyone,

This game consists of 11 levels for now, other level will come soon.

It is a simple 2d shooter game where the player shoots some green balls that differ in number and how they are arranged as you progress through the levels. A level is won only if all the green balls are cleared. the bullets of the player are limited and can be earned if the shot bullet is entered into a special bonus area.

Give it a try... and please let me know in comment if any bugs or inconvenience encountered.
